title: Marichal 2018 Reserve Collection Tannat (Canelones)
description: Pinched blackberry aromas include a note of leather, while this fresh-style Tannat is tightly wound, with high acidity. Short pops of tart black cherry, dark plum and blackberry flavors finish clean and short, with a dash of leftover oak.

title: Marie Copinet NV Brut Blanc de Blancs Chardonnay (Champagne)
description: This ripe, soft style of Chardonnay from family vineyards on chalk slopes presents layers of red apple and flashes of lime. It is lightly textured and openly fruity. Drink now.

title: Martin Ranch 2017 Therese Vineyards Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
description: Dark berry and plum meet with caramel on the pleasantly easy nose of this bottling. Tobacco and wood spice show on the palate alongside the dark-berry core.

title: Palladino 2017 Ornato  (Barolo)
description: Scorched earth, camphor, new leather and prune aromas form the nose. The assertive, monolithic palate recalls dried cherry, licorice and the scorching heat of alcohol that throws it off balance. Grainy tannins clench the finish.

title: Paris Valley Road 2018 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
description: Freshly smashed black-cherry and boysenberry aromas meet with touches of tar, black olive and purple flowers on the nose of this bottling. There's a hint of tobacco leaf on the front of the palate, which is firm with tannins while running through juicy flavors of blackberry jam and cherry compote.
